actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To nullify the recent increases in certain Federal salaries.

summary.text: Requires that the pay recommendations of the President relating to Members of Congress, Federal officials, and Federal judges be determined as if such recommendations had been disapproved. Declares that this Act does not apply to the extent that it would reduce the pay of Federal judges.

titles.title: To nullify the recent increases in certain Federal salaries.
